title: Merchant
description: A merchant available for discovery and commerce.

id.description: Global ID (GID) uniquely identifying this merchant.

description.description: Merchant description in one or more formats. At least one format must be provided.

category.description: Category: taxonomy path (e.g., 'Restaurants > Sushi') or merchant-defined type.

media.description: Merchant media (images, videos). First item is the featured media.

tags.description: Merchant tags for categorization and search.

locations.description: Merchant retail locations (stores, pickup points, etc.).

metadata.description: Business-defined custom data extending the standard merchant model.
